meta.description: Stiletto the best website for Last Oasis
techTree.description: View and control your clan's technology tree.
crafting.title: Last Oasis Crafting Calculator
about.disclaimer: This website uses utilities related to the game 'Last Oasis' but is not affiliated with
common.cookiesNotice: This website uses cookies to enhance the user experience.
common.necessaryCookiesDescription: These cookies are essential for the website to function properly and cannot be disabled.
common.analyticsCookiesDescription: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with the website, and help us improve our services.
common.functionalityCookiesDescription: These cookies enable the website to provide enhanced functionality and personalization.
crafting.description: Here you can see and automatically calculate the materials needed to build each item.
auctionTimers.description: See how much time is left to finish the auctions of the maps you want easily
trades.title: Trading System
trades.description: You can create offers or search for them easily from here, you don't need to be on 20 discord servers looking for who to exchange with
walkers.description: Check when your walkers were last used and who used them in a simple and quick way. I have created a discord bot that apart from giving other functions allows you to control the walkers log in an easier way
diplomacy.title: Clan Diplomacy
diplomacy.description: Use this section to control your clan, make alliances or send wars and to easily show it to your clan members.
resourceMaps.description: Create and edit maps to add resources or strategic points.
profile.deleteNotice: The administrator will be notified to delete the user, the user will not be deleted directly.
profile.deleteWarning: This option is not reversible, your user and all his data will be deleted.
common.name: Name
errors.apiConnection: Error when connecting to the API
errors.pageNotFound: The page you are looking for does not exist
errors.noPermission: You do not have permission to access this page
transactions.title: Transactions
members.loadingRequests: Loading the list of requests to enter the clan
clan.transferWarning: This option is not reversible, so be careful who you pass it on to in the leadership of the clan
clan.deleteWarning: By deleting the clan you will delete all the data linked to it, be careful because this option is not reversible
common.generateShareLink: Generate a link to share it
crafting.listOfMaterials: List of all necessary materials by
clan.applicationSent: Application to enter the clan sent
errors.noAccess: You don't have access here, try to log in again
errors.changeOwner: Error when change owner of clan
errors.noClan: You need a clan to enter here
clan.needClanAccess: You need to have a clan to access this section
walkers.discordLinkNotice: For the walkers to appear it is necessary to link the discord server with the clan, only users with administration power can add the discord server.
walkers.discordLinkInstructions: You can link the discord server more easily by typing !linkserver in your discord server when you have added the bot.
discord.botDescription: You need to add the bot to your discord to compile the list of walkers from the log, but it also has other functions like checking what you need to do the different items
maps.openExistingMap: Open a map that has already been created
maps.backToList: Back to the list of maps
maps.notSameAsGame: Not the same as in the game
trades.publishTradeNotice: If you want to publish your own exchange offers you have to be connected
trades.noTradeOffersFound: No trade offers were found with this filter
diplomacy.relationshipNotice: This data is not saved, if you reload the page it will be deleted
common.reportBugsNotice: If you find a bug, let me know on GitHub so it can be fixed!
discord.botNotice: I have also created a discord bot useful to control the walkers and make a list of what is needed to create objects.
techTree.needClanForFunction: You need a clan for this function
common.cookies: Cookies - This site only uses Google cookies to view web traffic.
common.privateData: Private data - The only registration data saved is Discord ID and Discord Tag.
common.whatDoWeUseThisDataFor: What do we use this data for?
common.provideFunctions: To provide some functions such as clan management and map management.
common.displayDiscordTagAndId: Your Discord Tag and Discord ID can be displayed on our website for different functions such as trading or clan functions.
common.websiteDirectedTo: Our website, products and services are directed to persons who are at least 13 years of age or older.
common.changesToPrivacyPolicyNotice: To ensure that our policies always comply with current legal requirements, we reserve the right to make changes to ensure that we are always in line with current legislation.
common.contactMe: If you think something is missing or should be changed, please contact me to fix it.
common.dataAddedToWebsite: Data added to the website such as diplomacy, map resources or clan members are stored in a database and the necessary security measures are taken so that no one can access these data.
common.sourceCodePublishedOnGitHub: Source Code is published on GitHub for full disclosure where you can also report any issues found.
discord.readDiscordClanLogNotice: If you want the bot to read the clan log, it is necessary for other functions.
discord.readClanLogAndKick: Read the clan log and if a member was kicked, kick from here too.
discord.automaticKickMembersFromClan: Automatic kick members from the clan
discord.pvpMarkNotReady: Automatically if a PVP walker is used it is marked as not ready.
discord.warnIfSomeoneBringsOutWalker: Warns if someone brings out a walker they don't own.
error.discordClanNotLinked: Your clan does not have a linked discord
clan.lookingForNewMembers: Looking for new members? By disabling this option the clan does not appear in the clan list.
privacy.title: Privacy & Cookies Policy - Stiletto
privacy.description: Privacy and Cookies Policy for Stiletto
privacy.heading: Privacy & Cookies Policy
privacy.introText: This Privacy & Cookies Policy describes how Stiletto collects, uses, and protects your information. By using this website, you agree to the terms described herein. This policy is intended for users worldwide aged 13 and above.
privacy.dataCollected.discord: Discord ID and Discord Tag, collected when you connect your Discord account.
privacy.dataCollected.noOther: No other direct personal data is collected.
privacy.cookies.analytics: Plausible Analytics is used for privacy-friendly basic analytics. No personal data is tracked.
privacy.cookies.discordWidget: The official Discord widget is used to display servers/communities.
privacy.cookies.giscus: Giscus is used for comments (based on GitHub Discussions).
privacy.cookies.library2: library by orestbida to request explicit cookie consent from users.
privacy.purpose.functions: To provide functionalities such as clan management, maps, and trading.
privacy.purpose.display: To display some user data (Discord Tag/ID) in the context of public features like clans or trading.
privacy.managementText: Users can delete their account and all associated data at any time via a button in their profile.
privacy.securityText: All data is stored in protected databases. Reasonable measures are taken to prevent unauthorized access. The project source code is public on GitHub.
privacy.cookieConsentText: This website uses the cookieconsent library to request your explicit consent for the use of cookies. You may accept all cookies or configure your preferences at any time.
privacy.rightsText: You may request access to, correction, or deletion of your data at any time by deleting your account or contacting the administrator.
privacy.contactText: For privacy inquiries, please contact the administrator via Discord (user: dm94dani).
privacy.changesText: Stiletto reserves the right to modify this policy to adapt to legal or functional changes. Significant modifications will be notified on the website.
